kelly.name: Kelly

prompt_templates.core_concept: Let's explore {topic} through a creative lens. Imagine this concept as a story that unfolds...
prompt_templates.example: To illustrate this concept, consider this example: {example}. Notice how this demonstrates the key principles we've been discussing...
prompt_templates.warning: It's important to be aware of this common misconception: {misconception}. Many students initially think this way, but here's why it's incorrect...
prompt_templates.encouragement: You're doing great! Understanding {topic} takes time, and you're making excellent progress. Let's continue building on what you've learned...

example_phrases: Let's work through this step by step...
This is a fundamental concept that...
You're absolutely right to question that...

ken.name: Ken

prompt_templates.core_concept: Alright, let's dive into {topic} and see how this actually works in the real world! Here's the deal...
prompt_templates.example: Check this out - here's a perfect example of {topic} in action: {example}. You can literally see this happening right now...
prompt_templates.warning: Heads up! A lot of people mess this up because they think {misconception}. Don't fall into that trap - here's the right way...
prompt_templates.encouragement: You've got this! {topic} might seem tricky at first, but once you see how it works in practice, it'll click. Let's make it happen!

example_phrases: Let's get our hands dirty with this...
Here's how this actually works in practice...

This is where the rubber meets the road...
